name: Under The War
description: Cities are ruled by extremist organizations, and here become closed cages. As a leader of a team, you not only need to find enough materials to make your team survive, but also to be responsible for each of your choices. Under your leadership, can your team escape from the city?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
